param.label: Underlying mapping software used [default: minimap2-sr].

param.name: minimap2_reference_is_index
param.label: Treat reference as a minimap2 database, not as a FASTA file.

param.name: min_read_aligned_length
param.label: Exclude reads with smaller numbers of aligned bases. default: 0

param.name: min_read_percent_identity
param.label: Exclude reads by overall percent identity e.g. 95 for 95%. default: 0

param.name: min_read_aligned_percent
param.label: Exclude reads by percent aligned bases e.g. 95 means 95% of the read's bases must be aligned. default: 0

param.name: min_read_aligned_length_pair
param.label: Exclude pairs with smaller numbers of aligned bases. Implies --proper-pairs-only. default: 0

param.name: min_read_percent_identity_pair
param.label: Exclude pairs by overall percent identity e.g. 95 for 95%. Implies --proper-pairs-only. default: 0

param.name: min_read_aligned_percent_pair
param.label: Exclude reads by percent aligned bases e.g. 95 means 95% of the read's bases must be aligned. Implies --proper-pairs-only. default: 0

param.name: proper_pairs_only
param.label: Require reads to be mapped as proper pairs.

param.name: exclude_supplementary
param.label: Exclude supplementary alignments.

param.name: methods
param.label: Method(s) for calculating coverage [default: mean]. A more thorough description of the different methods is available at https://github.com/wwood/CoverM\#calculation-methods but briefly
param.option: (default) Percentage relative abundance of each genome, and the unmapped read percentage
(default) Average number of aligned reads overlapping each position on the contig
Average number of aligned reads overlapping each position after removing the most deeply and shallow-ly covered positions. See --trim-min/--trim-max to adjust.
Number of bases covered by 1 or more reads
Length of each contig in base pairs
Number of reads aligned toq each contig. Note that a single read may be aligned to multiple contigs with supplementary alignments
("MetaBAT adjusted coverage") Coverage as defined in Kang et al 2015 https://doi.org/10.7717/peerj.1165
Number of reads aligned divided by the length of the contig
Reads mapped per kilobase of contig, per million mapped reads
Transcripts Per Million as described in Li et al 2010 https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btp692

param.name: min_covered_fraction
param.label: Genomes with less coverage than this reported as having zero coverage. default: 10

param.name: contig_end_exclusion
param.label: Exclude bases at the ends of reference sequences from calculation default: 75

param.name: trim_min
param.label: Remove this smallest fraction of positions when calculating trimmed_mean default: 5

param.name: trim_max
param.label: Maximum fraction for trimmed_mean calculations default: 95

param.name: output_format
param.label: Shape of output: 'sparse' for long format, 'dense' for species-by-site. [default: dense]

param.name: no_zeros
param.label: Omit printing of genomes that have zero coverage.
